name: DC Universe Online: Fight for the Light
name_original: DC Universe Online: Fight for the Light
description:
DC Universe Online: Fight for the Light is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by WBIE. It came out on 06-09-2011. Sony Interactive Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
DC Universe Online: Fight for the Light is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
